name: Out-of-Touch
description:
Out of Touch is a short puzzle demo set in two different timelines.

Having your cryosleep interrupted, you wake up in an abandoned and dangerous facility. With the help of an overseeing robot and your time-shifting power, it's your job to figure your way out of the lab. But just what was being done here? And why were you abandoned, along with the whole building?

Out of Touch was created for the one-week Global MoonJam held in May 2022. The theme was "time". While the game itself was produced within the week time-frame, a plethora of free models, textures, sounds, and music were used.  We really hope you enjoy this demo and would love to hear any kind of feedback!

Extra mode revealed at the end of the game!

Controls:

A/D - movement ( left and right)

W- Jump

S- Crouch

E - Interact with buttons

F- Time Shift

ESC- Pause
